tool_description: The API provides information on total cases, deaths and recovered worldwide and for specific countries.
title: CoronaStatsByCountry

api_list.name: Help
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronastatsbycountry.p.rapidapi.com/help"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronastatsbycountry.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Total/contryname
api_list.description: Total cases, deaths, recovered for select country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronastatsbycountry.p.rapidapi.com/total/{country}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronastatsbycountry.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronastatsbycountry.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
